bee-like

dom schwab

Sincerity</br> is not</br> niceness &</br> I will not</br> play nice,</br> </br> but</br> those who you admire,</br> everyone who touches</br> you,</br> is a teacher & a learner,</br> wants to be loved & to</br> love,</br> so don’t delay to ask for</br> help, if that was what you</br> needed,</br> for I have strenuously</br> learnt the value that is</br> me[</br> </br> &</br> as i you,</br> lover…</br> as i you].</br></br> </p>
